myProducts.title: My Products
myProducts.subtitle: Manage your product memberships
myProducts.empty: You don't belong to any product yet.

leave.title: Leave Product
leave.description: Are you sure you want to leave {{name}}?
leave.warning: You will lose access to all data in this product.
leave.lastAdminError: You cannot leave as you are the last admin of this product.

title: Products
subtitle: Products in {{org}}
empty: No products yet. Create your first product to get started.
noOrgSelected: Select an organization to view products.
notFound: Product not found or you don't have access.
createDescription: Create a new product to organize your marketing efforts.

form.name: Product name
form.slugHint: URL-friendly identifier. Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens.

delete.title: Delete Product
delete.consequences: This will permanently delete the product and remove all members. All associated data will be lost.

members.title: Product Team
members.subtitle: Manage who can access {{name}}
members.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the product?

context.sectionDescription: Generate and review the AI-enriched context for this product.
context.baselineDescription: Provide the canonical information the AI must respect when generating context.
context.title: Context summary
context.subtitleEmpty: Generate the initial context using your sources and baseline.
context.valuePropositionHelp: Elevator pitch or main promise for the product.
context.productCategoryHelp: High-level product category (e.g., CRM, Analytics, Platform).
context.productTypeHelp: Delivery type (web app, mobile, API, platform…).
context.businessModelHelp: How you monetize (SaaS, marketplace, usage, on-prem).
context.stageHelp: Current maturity (idea, MVP, beta, production, scale-up).
context.personasHelp: Primary user personas to anchor tone and priorities.
context.platformsHelp: Channels where the product exists (web, iOS, Android…).
context.technicalStackHelp: Core technologies used by the product.
context.languagePreferenceHelp: Preferred language to generate the context.
context.toneGuidelinesHelp: Preferred communication tone for the product.
context.noSources: No external sources connected yet. Connect a source (e.g. GitHub) to enrich the context.

products.title: Products
products.subtitle: Manage products in {{name}}
products.empty: No products yet. Create your first product to get started.
